Replies.Reply: Hello? Can you hear me? Can you speak?

...eyes...
...her...eyes...
...her eyes...she can't...

Her eyes. That's how they were.

You?

enough.

Tetrototoxin. Fascinating stuff. It paralyzes you, but leaves all other neurological functions intact.

for years. But it wasn't very funny, was it? No. Played much better in my head. Maybe it's my delivery.

freedom. All I want is a good night's sleep.
